name: Loki, the Ancient Demon Lord
text:
Continuous: This card gains [+0/+100] for each card in your graveyard.
Enter: Look at the top ten cards from your main deck. Put one of them into your hand, return the rest to your main deck and shuffle it.
Activate. Remove a resonator in your graveyard from the game: This card deals 100 damage to each resonator.
